primary.name: Ar-61 Tenderizer
primary.goal: Deliver highcaliber bursts to break light armor

secondary.name: PLAS-15 Loyalist
secondary.goal: Splash plasma for flexible secondary fire

armor_passive.name: Unflinching
armor_passive.special_traits: Reduce flinch, camera shake and improve durability
armor_passive.goal: Stay shooting on target even when shot, better for anti-tank

stratagems.name: GR-8 Recoilless Rifle
stratagems.special_traits: Reloadable anti-tank launcher with backpack ammo supply; optional HE shell mode
stratagems.goal: Repeatedly blast armored targets (or switch to HE shells for infantry)

stratagems.name: A-AT-12 Anti-Tank Emplacement
stratagems.special_traits: Buildable AT cannon emplacement; manned by player, fires high-penetration shells (very slow reload)
stratagems.goal: Allow a Helldiver to engage and destroy armored targets from a fortified position

stratagems.name: A-MLS-4X Rocket Sentry
stratagems.special_traits: Automated mini-rocket launcher turret; fires guided mini-rockets at targets
stratagems.goal: Defensive anti-armor support  tracks and strikes incoming medium enemies with homing rockets

stratagems.name: EXO-49 Emancipator Exosuit
stratagems.special_traits: Heavily armored bipedal vehicle; equipped with rocket launcher & heavy MG; anti-tank capable
stratagems.goal: Mobile firepower platform  provides heavy fire support against both infantry and armored targets

how_to_play.solo: Use Tenderizer for precise headshots, heavy gear for armor penetration.
how_to_play.co_op: Prioritize heavy targets, coordinating stratagems to eliminate threats.
how_to_play.combo_flow: Weaken armor with Thermite, follow with Tenderizer and stratagem bursts.

Anti-Tank_automatons.objective: Specialize in eliminating armored and high-threat Automaton units.
Anti-Tank_automatons.lore: The Precision Juggernaut is feared by Automaton armor columns, erasing heavy threats with relentless anti-tank fire.

primary.name: SG-451 Cookout
primary.goal: Incinerate close threats with fiery knockback bursts

secondary.name: GP-31 Grenade Pistol
secondary.goal: Demolish spawn buildings and clustered enemies

armor_passive.name: Med-Kit
armor_passive.goal: An attempt at surviving longer with your stims

stratagems.name: FLAM-40 Flamethrower
stratagems.special_traits: Incendiary stream weapon, continuous close-range fire, creates lingering flames
stratagems.goal: Torch and control hordes of enemies at close range; area denial via napalm flames

stratagems.name: LIFT-860 Hover Pack
stratagems.special_traits: Advanced jump pack allowing the user to hover briefly in midair after a jump
stratagems.goal: Improve maneuverability and cross dangerous gaps

stratagems.name: Eagle 500kg Bomb
stratagems.special_traits: Massive single anti-tank bomb; penetrates ground then explodes, huge damage
stratagems.goal: Obliterate a single target or tight cluster with a super-heavy bomb

stratagems.name: B-100 Portable Hellbomb
stratagems.special_traits: Very powerful timed explosive charge (portable nuke)
stratagems.goal: Destroy objectives or large enemy clusters

how_to_play.solo: Prioritize high-threat enemies with Cookout and Thermite while hovering to avoid being surrounded.
how_to_play.co_op: Time heavy strikes like the 500kg bomb and Hellbomb while team clears smaller threats.
how_to_play.positioning: Aggressive, using hover to close distance for Thermite and Cookout bursts.
how_to_play.combo_flow: Hover in for Cookout and Thermite strike, deploy Hellbomb or call 500kg for maximum destruction.

Anti-Tank_terminids.objective: Eliminate Terminid heavy targets swiftly and decisively.
Anti-Tank_terminids.lore: The 'Titan Scorchers' dive into hellfire, bringing enough explosive might to end even the thickest carapace.

primary.name: AR-23E Liberator Cocussive
primary.goal: Stun and push back hordes in close-range fights

secondary.name: PLAS-15 Loyalist
secondary.goal: Splash plasma for flexible secondary fire

armor_passive.name: Gunslinger
armor_passive.special_traits: Make sidearms fast and stable in gunplay
armor_passive.goal: Make sidearms as good as primary weapons

stratagems.name: GR-8 Recoilless Rifle
stratagems.special_traits: Reloadable anti-tank launcher; optional HE shell mode
stratagems.goal: Repeatedly blast armored targets or switch to HE shells for infantry

stratagems.name: A-AT-12 Anti-Tank Emplacement
stratagems.special_traits: Buildable AT cannon with high penetration
stratagems.goal: Destroy heavy Illuminate armor and fortifications

stratagems.name: A-MLS-4X Rocket Sentry
stratagems.special_traits: Automated mini-rocket launcher; fires homing rockets
stratagems.goal: Track and strike incoming medium/heavy enemies

stratagems.name: A-AC-8 Autocannon Sentry
stratagems.special_traits: Automated cannon; fires 3-round bursts of explosive shells
stratagems.goal: Provide defensive explosive fire against large targets

how_to_play.solo: Use Cocussive and Loyalist for general control; deploy Recoilless and emplacements on heavies.
how_to_play.co_op: Anchor anti-heavy efforts and protect allies by breaking armor and deleting elites.
how_to_play.positioning: Mid-backline with clear sightlines on heavy targets, avoid overexposure.
how_to_play.combo_flow: Deploy emplacements, fire Recoilless at weak points, and cover with Rocket/Autocannon Sentries.

Illuminate_Anti-Tank.objective: Dedicated to destroying Leviathans and other super-heavy Illuminate threats.
Illuminate_Anti-Tank.lore: The Leviathan Slayer is the cornerstone of anti-heavy operations against the Illuminate. Its firepower neutralizes the enemy’s largest constructs before they dominate the battlefield.

primary.name: CB-9 Exploding Crossbow
primary.goal: Deploy silent Explosive projectiles for sabotage

secondary.name: LAS-7 Dagger
secondary.goal: Quickly finish off weak enemies with laser strikes

armor_passive.name: Fortified
armor_passive.goal: Survive explosions and control heavy weapons better

stratagems.name: MLS-4X Commando
stratagems.special_traits: Disposable four-round rocket launcher, laser-guided or dumb-fire modes
stratagems.goal: Engage armored targets with multiple guided micro-missiles in quick succession

stratagems.name: A-MLS-4X Rocket Sentry
stratagems.special_traits: Automated mini-rocket launcher turret; fires guided mini-rockets at targets
stratagems.goal: Defensive anti-armor support  tracks and strikes incoming medium enemies with homing rockets

stratagems.name: Eagle Strafing Run
stratagems.special_traits: Instant-response Eagle flyby, sprays 23mm cannon shells (Anti-Tank I) in a line
stratagems.goal: Buzz the battlefield to quickly clear out lines of small enemies or damage medium targets with minimal delay

stratagems.name: SH-20 Ballistic Shield Backpack
stratagems.special_traits: Backpack that can deploy a one-handed ballistic shield (when equipped)
stratagems.goal: Provide frontal protection to the user while allowing one-handed weapon use (pistols, one-handed melee)

how_to_play.solo: Absorb small arms fire using ballistic shield and crossbow, dagger to eliminate smaller threats quickly.
how_to_play.co_op: Frontline tanking role, using crossbow and stratagems to handle factories and hulks.
how_to_play.positioning: Hold strategic points, using shield and firepower to manage enemy flow.
how_to_play.combo_flow: Set Thermite traps, crossbow detonations, finish small threats with dagger strikes.

Crowd Control_automatons.objective: Absorb fire, control battlefield, and handle diverse threats efficiently.
Crowd Control_automatons.lore: Helldivers on the Automaton front rely on stealth explosives and resilient shields to break entrenched positions.

primary.name: AR-23C Liberator Concussive
primary.goal: Stun and push back hordes in close-range fights

secondary.name: GP-31 Grenade Pistol
secondary.goal: Demolish spawn buildings and clustered enemies

armor_passive.name: Inflammable
armor_passive.goal: Used to protect you from your own fire damage and Terminid swarms

stratagems.name: FLAM-40 Flamethrower
stratagems.special_traits: Incendiary stream weapon, continuous close-range fire, creates lingering flames
stratagems.goal: Torch and control hordes of enemies at close range; area denial via napalm flames

stratagems.name: A-ARC-3 Tesla Tower
stratagems.special_traits: Stationary arc defense tower; periodically zaps multiple enemies with chaining lightning bolts
stratagems.goal: Base defense against hordes; automatically stun and thin out waves of enemies

stratagems.name: Orbital Napalm Barrage
stratagems.special_traits: Multiple incendiary canisters from orbit; set a wide area on fire with lingering napalm
stratagems.goal: Deny and damage; engulf an entire zone in flames to flush out or block enemies

stratagems.name: LIFT-182 Warp Pack
stratagems.special_traits: Teleportation pack allowing short-range warp teleport after a brief charge
stratagems.goal: Rapid repositioning or emergency escape from swarms

how_to_play.solo: Burn through swarms with flamethrower and control lanes with gas grenades. Warp Pack provides emergency exits.
how_to_play.co_op: Coordinate fire lanes with Tesla Tower and Napalm Barrage to thin the swarm while allies cover angles.
how_to_play.positioning: Hold chokepoints and hallways; keep your back to cover and your Warp Pack ready.
how_to_play.combo_flow: Open with Orbital Napalm for area denial, follow with Tesla Tower and gas grenades, then sweep with flamethrower.

Crowd Control_terminids.objective: Repel Terminid swarms through layered area denial and crowd control.
Crowd Control_terminids.lore: The 'Flamefront Marshals' are the last line against the chittering flood, carving fiery borders the bugs dare not cross.

primary.name: AR-23A Liberator Carbine
primary.goal: Dominate tight corridors with rapid burst fire

secondary.name: P-72 Crisper
secondary.goal: Flash-Fire Crowd-Control in shotgun pistol package

armor_passive.name: Siege-Ready
armor_passive.special_traits: Reload faster and carry more ammo for primary weapons

stratagems.name: A-MG-43 Machine Gun Sentry
stratagems.special_traits: Automated turret armed with MG-43; long sustained fire
stratagems.goal: Deploy to cut down Votles and provide defensive suppression

stratagems.name: Orbital Gas Strike
stratagems.special_traits: Orbital chemical gas saturation
stratagems.goal: Control large swarms and redirect enemy movement

stratagems.name: StA-X3 W.A.S.P. Launcher
stratagems.special_traits: 7 micro-missiles; homing or airburst
stratagems.goal: Pick off medium units and disperse incoming formations

stratagems.name: Eagle Cluster Bomb
stratagems.special_traits: Targeted airburst with multiple sub-munitions
stratagems.goal: Eliminate swarms quickly without damaging structures

how_to_play.solo: Use Carbine to mow down Votles. Deploy Machine Gun Sentry for kill support.
how_to_play.co_op: Use WASP for medium threats, and gas for disruption while Sentries hold ground.
how_to_play.positioning: Hold lanes and create overlapping fields of fire with gas support.
how_to_play.combo_flow: Gas grenades for disruption, WASP launches for mediums, Cluster Bomb for swarm panic.

Illuminate_Crowd Control.objective: Shred swarming Illuminate forces and control the battlefield with sentries and WASP missiles.
Illuminate_Crowd Control.lore: When the Illuminate descend in overwhelming numbers, Helldivers rely on rapid-response sentries and guided munitions to seize control. The Waspstorm Enforcer floods the battlefield with precision missiles and gas clouds to scatter their formations.

primary.name: R-36 Eruptor
primary.goal: Obliterate armor with explosive sniper precision

secondary.name: P-19 Redeemer
secondary.goal: Spray panic-causing shots when things get dire

grenade.name: G-6 Smoke
grenade.goal: Create smoke for retreat or repositioning

armor_passive.name: Scout
armor_passive.goal: Used for hit-and-run tactics or stealth kill enemies

stratagems.name: Hover Pack
stratagems.special_traits: Advanced jump pack allowing the user to hover briefly in midair after a jump
stratagems.goal: Improve maneuverability and avoid frontline fire

stratagems.name: M-102 Fast Recon Vehicle
stratagems.special_traits: Light vehicle with mounted heavy machine gun; penetrates heavy armor
stratagems.goal: Provide fast transport and scouting, allowing quick disengagement and repositioning

stratagems.name: Orbital Walking Barrage
stratagems.special_traits: A creeping barrage that moves forward from the beacon, multiple explosions in sequence
stratagems.goal: Advance a line of explosions to sweep an area clear

stratagems.name: LAS-99 Quasar Cannon
stratagems.special_traits: Energy-based heavy weapon, charge-up beam, infinite ammo (cooldown instead of reload)
stratagems.goal: Defeat heavily armored elite enemies with a charged explosive laser burst

how_to_play.solo: Use stealth to avoid detection, strike with R-36 Eruptor and disengage with Hover Pack.
how_to_play.co_op: Focus on weak points and provide flanking explosive fire while team handles the frontline.
how_to_play.positioning: Operate from flanks or elevated terrain using Hover Pack and smoke grenades for cover.
how_to_play.combo_flow: Open with smoke to obscure approach, hover to reposition, and strike with Eruptor or Quasar Cannon.

Saboteur_automatons.objective: Sabotage Automaton forces with precision explosives and quick repositioning.
Saboteur_automatons.lore: Saboteur Helldivers are the ghosts of the Automaton warzones, appearing only long enough to cripple heavy units and vanish into smoke.

secondary.name: GP-20 Ultimatum
secondary.goal: Obliterate armored threats with explosive pistol blasts

armor_passive.name: Hover Pack
armor_passive.goal: Used for hit-and-run tactics and avoiding ground-bound enemies

stratagems.name: M-102 Fast Recon Vehicle
stratagems.special_traits: Light vehicle with mounted heavy machine gun; penetrates heavy armor
stratagems.goal: Provide fast transport and scouting; quick disengagement during missions

stratagems.name: LIFT-860 Hover Pack
stratagems.special_traits: Advanced jump pack allowing the user to hover briefly in midair after a jump
stratagems.goal: Improve maneuverability and dodge dangerous swarms

stratagems.name: GL-21 Grenade Launcher
stratagems.special_traits: Belt-fed semi-automatic grenade launcher, high explosive AoE
stratagems.goal: Rapidly clear groups of light/medium infantry or nests with explosive grenades

stratagems.name: Orbital Gas Strike
stratagems.special_traits: Orbital deployment of chemical gas warheads; saturates area with toxic gas clouds
stratagems.goal: Disable and damage enemies in an area without structural damage

how_to_play.solo: Use hover mobility to harass nests and high-priority targets while dodging swarms. Gas grenades cover escapes.
how_to_play.co_op: Coordinate ambushes using gas and grenade launchers to collapse enemy formations while allies clean up stragglers.
how_to_play.positioning: High mobility, striking from unexpected angles. Avoid static positions to survive swarms.
how_to_play.combo_flow: Hover in, deploy gas to disrupt, destroy nests with Ultimatum and GL-21, and retreat with Hover Pack.

Saboteur_terminids.objective: Sabotage and eliminate Terminid nests with surgical precision while avoiding swarm entrapment.
Saboteur_terminids.lore: The 'Nestbreakers' are feared by the bugs—they arrive in a cloud of poison and leave only shattered hives in their wake.

primary.name: AR-23A Liberator Carbine
primary.goal: Dominate tight corridors with rapid burst fire

secondary.name: GP-20 Ultimatum
secondary.goal: Obliterate armoured threats with Explosive pistol blasts

armor_passive.name: Siege-Ready
armor_passive.special_traits: Reload faster and carry more ammo for primary weapons

stratagems.name: M-102 Fast Recon Vehicle
stratagems.special_traits: Light vehicle with mounted heavy machine gun
stratagems.goal: Provide fast transport and scouting for sabotage missions

stratagems.name: APW-1 Anti-Materiel Rifle
stratagems.special_traits: Long-range, heavy armor-piercing sniper rifle
stratagems.goal: Eliminate armored targets (medium vehicles, elites) from a distance

stratagems.name: B-1 Supply Pack
stratagems.special_traits: Backpack supply cache with magazines and explosives
stratagems.goal: Provide on-demand ammo and explosive resupply in the field

stratagems.name: Eagle Strafing Run
stratagems.special_traits: Instant Eagle flyby; sprays 23mm cannon shells
stratagems.goal: Clear lines of enemies and weaken dropships on call

how_to_play.solo: Carbine for hordes, Ultimatum for dropships, Anti-Materiel Rifle for Overseers.
how_to_play.co_op: Support team by picking priority targets and keeping supply lines active.
how_to_play.positioning: Stay mobile with FRV, clear nests, and rotate between objectives rapidly.
how_to_play.combo_flow: Destroy objectives fast, resupply, move to next target, and call Eagle runs for cover.

Illuminate_Saboteur.objective: Hunt Overseers and disrupt enemy dropships with fast-moving sabotage tactics.
Illuminate_Saboteur.lore: The Overseer Hunter thrives on mobility and opportunistic strikes. Helldivers equipped with this loadout move like shadows, crippling key Illuminate assets before vanishing into the next skirmish.

primary.name: PLAS-101 Purifier
primary.goal: Splash-damage enemies with charged plasma waves

secondary.name: GP-31 Grenade Pistol
secondary.goal: Demolish spawn buildings and clustered enemies

armor_passive.name: Med-Kit
armor_passive.goal: An attempt at surviving longer with your stims

stratagems.name: RL-77 Airburst Rocket Launcher
stratagems.special_traits: Mobile artillery
stratagems.goal: Eliminate grouped enemies, suppress distractions

stratagems.name: FX-12 Shield Generator Relay
stratagems.special_traits: Static 360 bubble shield; blocks incoming projectiles
stratagems.goal: Provide temporary cover by blocking enemy projectile attacks in all directions

stratagems.name: A-M-12 Mortar Sentry
stratagems.special_traits: Automated mortar turret; lobs explosive shells in an arc, hitting enemies behind cover
stratagems.goal: Area denial  bombard groups of enemies or choke points with indirect high-explosive fire

stratagems.name: A-MG-101 HMG Emplacement
stratagems.special_traits: Buildable Heavy Machine Gun emplacement; must be manned by a Helldiver, has cover and unlimited ammo
stratagems.goal: Provide a player with a powerful mounted HMG position for defense

how_to_play.solo: Leverage plasma and grenade pistol to soften enemies before retreating behind shield relay.
how_to_play.co_op: Anchor the team’s position with shield relay and mortar support while healing allies with Med-Kit.
how_to_play.positioning: Stay near emplacements, leveraging plasma and grenade fire while keeping stims ready.
how_to_play.combo_flow: Start with Airburst for area denial, drop Shield Relay, then clean up with Purifier and GP-31 bursts.

Stratagem Support_automatons.objective: Support Automaton missions by amplifying stratagem efficiency and team survival.
Stratagem Support_automatons.lore: Stratagem Support Helldivers embody the synergy of tech and firepower, keeping the team alive under a rain of metal.

primary.name: PLAS-101 Purifier
primary.goal: Splash-damage enemies with charged plasma waves

secondary.name: P-113 Verdict
secondary.goal: Punch through weak spots with heavy pistols

armor_passive.name: Supply Pack
armor_passive.special_traits: Backpack supply cache; contains additional magazines and explosives
armor_passive.goal: Provide on-demand ammunition and gear resupply to teammates

stratagems.name: MD-17 Anti-Tank Mines
stratagems.special_traits: Explosive mines; anti-tank high-damage ordinance
stratagems.goal: Neutralize tanks and other heavy units with high-powered, armor-piercing mines

stratagems.name: Eagle Cluster Bomb
stratagems.special_traits: Targeted cluster bomb strike releasing multiple sub-munitions
stratagems.goal: Precisely clear out packs of infantry in a focused area

stratagems.name: B-1 Supply Pack
stratagems.special_traits: Backpack supply cache; contains additional magazines and explosives
stratagems.goal: Provide on-demand ammunition and gear resupply to teammates during extended missions

stratagems.name: RS-422 Railgun
stratagems.special_traits: Charged precision rifle, extreme armor penetration, very slow fire rate
stratagems.goal: Punch through heavily armored targets with a single powerful shot

how_to_play.solo: Keep resources flowing with Supply Pack while carefully using Purifier and Railgun to manage both swarms and heavies.
how_to_play.co_op: Act as the team's backbone, providing ammunition and mines while delivering precise support fire.
how_to_play.positioning: Central to the squad; able to resupply allies while still having firing lines on advancing enemies.
how_to_play.combo_flow: Open with mines for chokepoints, support with Railgun and Cluster Bomb, then top off allies with Supply Pack.

Stratagem Support_terminids.objective: Provide tactical support and sustain the team's offensive while controlling resource flow.
Stratagem Support_terminids.lore: The 'Supplyline Sentinels' never run dry; where they tread, freedom marches on in a hail of plasma and resupply crates.

primary.name: R-36 Eruptor
primary.goal: Obliterate armor with explosive sniper precision

secondary.name: GP-31 Grenade Pistol
secondary.goal: Demolish spawn buildings and clustered enemies

armor_passive.name: Siege-Ready
armor_passive.special_traits: Reload faster and carry more ammo for primary weapons

stratagems.name: A-AT-12 Anti-Tank Emplacement
stratagems.special_traits: Buildable AT cannon; slow reload but high damage
stratagems.goal: Destroy Leviathans and repel heavy Illuminate threats

stratagems.name: A-MG-101 HMG Emplacement
stratagems.special_traits: Mounted heavy MG with unlimited ammo
stratagems.goal: Lock down corridors and provide defensive firepower

stratagems.name: A-FLAM-40 Flame Sentry
stratagems.special_traits: Automated flamethrower turret; short-range napalm
stratagems.goal: Incinerate close-approaching enemies and hold choke points

stratagems.name: MLS-4X Commando
stratagems.special_traits: Four-barrel rocket launcher with laser-guided mode
stratagems.goal: Engage mids and reinforce defensive holds

how_to_play.solo: Flame Sentry keeps enemies at bay; Eruptor and Thermite support the emplacements.
how_to_play.co_op: Anchor the team’s defense; Anti-Tank and HMG for Leviathans, Commando for mids.
how_to_play.positioning: Choose high ground or defensible cover to maximize your fields of fire.
how_to_play.combo_flow: Thermite first, emplacements next, finish pushes with Eruptor shots.

Illuminate_Stratagem Support.objective: Fortify positions and annihilate approaching enemies with layered emplacements.
Illuminate_Stratagem Support.lore: The Bulwark Pyre transforms any choke point into an impenetrable inferno. Layered emplacements and searing flames punish any Illuminate foolish enough to approach.
